import numpy as np

import plotly.express as px
import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

                   '緯度':'latitude','経度':'longitude','各地の感染者数_1日ごとの発表数':'positive_daily',
                   '各地の感染者数_累計':'cumulative_sum_positive_daily','各地の死者数_1日ごとの発表数':'fatal_daily',

source.7378d1d1:
fig = px.scatter_geo(df,lat="latitude", lon="longitude", color="prefecture",
                     hover_name="prefecture", size="cumulative_sum_positive_daily",
                     animation_frame="date",
                     projection="equirectangular",template="plotly_dark",scope="asia")
fig.layout.updatemenus[0].buttons[0].args[1]["frame"]["duration"] = 10e-9
fig.show()
source.ecda8ddf:
lists=['positive_daily','cumulative_sum_positive_daily','fatal_daily','cumulative_sum_fatal_daily']
for list in lists:
    fig = px.line(df, x='date', y=list,hover_name="prefecture",template="plotly_dark",
             color="prefecture")
    fig.show()
